game.name: Who's Your Daddy?!
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 공유 및 분할 화면, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Who's Your Daddy is a casual multiplayer game featuring a clueless father attempting to prevent his infant son from certain death. Play with up to 7 of your friends, and test your parenting skills in a competitive setup with wacky physics and over 67 potentially ominous household items.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Who's Your Daddy is a casual multiplayer game featuring a clueless father attempting to prevent his infant son from certain death. Play with up to 7 of your friends, and test your parenting skills in a competitive setup with wacky physics and over 67 potentially ominous household items.
